```{r}
mls <- mls %>%
  mutate(home_team = recode(Home, !!!name_map),
         away_team = recode(Away, !!!name_map)) %>%
  rename("home_xg" = "xG...5",
         "away_xg" = "xG...7") %>%
  select(Date, home_team, home_xg, Score, away_xg, away_team, Venue)

write_csv(mls, "mls_sched.csv")
```
